type.name: T:Elysium.AccentBrushes
type.summary: Contains a set of brushes with a solid filling based on one of the accent colours.

property.name: P:Elysium.AccentBrushes.Blue
property.summary: Returns a brush with the solid fill colour of blue (#FF017BCD).
property.value: A brush with the solid fill colour of blue (#FF017BCD).

property.name: P:Elysium.AccentBrushes.Brown
property.summary: Returns a brush with the solid fill colour of brown (#FFA05000).
